function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of living spaces may increase the risk of disease propagation due to close proximity of individuals","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission within households","Mitigation":"Implementing improved ventilation systems and promoting good hygiene practices within integrated living spaces","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation fans, and UV light sanitation systems","People":"Residents living in integrated living spaces","Owner":"Building owners and property managers"},{"Description":"Historic buildings with limited modification possibilities may hinder the implementation of modern disease prevention measures","Impact":"Inability to retrofit buildings with compartmentalization and ventilation improvements, leading to continued risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Exploring alternative ways to improve ventilation and create separation within existing building layouts","Technologies":"Flexible partition systems and adaptable ventilation solutions","People":"Heritage property owners, preservation societies","Owner":"Architects, engineers, and building renovation specialists"},{"Description":"Rear property extensions and lack of space for containment areas may limit the implementation of quarantine measures","Impact":"Difficulty in creating designated containment spaces, hindering the ability to isolate individuals and prevent disease spread","Mitigation":"Exploring innovative space-saving containment solutions and retrofitting existing extensions to accommodate quarantine areas","Technologies":"Modular containment units and collapsible partition systems","People":"Property owners and residents","Owner":"Property developers and construction firms"}]}
